channel.title: Using items
channel.description:
Hey there... I need a bit of help.
Could someone please give me the codes for two things?
1. I need a code that if I use an item on another item, it takes them both away and gives a totally different item. I looked around in my source, but couldn't figure it out.
2. I need a code that if I use and item on an object, it teleports me somewhere else, and I still keep that item.
Sorry if these seem like stupid questions, but I am stupid, myself. :)
-Alexia

item.title: Using items
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

It doesn’t quite work with what I want to do. Read the PM that I sent you.

-Alexia

Read full topic

item.title: Using items
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

if(useItemID == 989 && (atObjectID == 172)) { if (absX == 1111 && absX == 2222, absY == 1111 && absY == 2222) == true) { teleportToX = 1111; teleportToY = 1111; deleteItem(989,1); } else if (absX == 1111 && absX == 2222, absY == 1111 && absY == 2222) == false) { teleportToX = 2222; teleportToY = 2222; deleteItem(989,1); }
}

Go into client.java and search for this:

rune();

And you should see this:

//smithing else if(useItemID == 451 && (atObjectID == 2781 || atObjectID == 11666)) { rune(); }

Add the code I gave you in the beggining here, then save and compile and see what happens… =)

Read full topic

item.title: Using items
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

			if(useItemID == 989 && (atObjectID == 172))
			{
	if (absX == 1111 && absX == 2222, absY == 1111 && absY == 2222) == true && (absX == 3333 && absX == 4444, absY == 3333 && absY == 4444) == false)
	{
		teleportToX = 1111;
		teleportToY = 1111;
	}
	else if (absX == 1111 && absX == 2222, absY == 1111 && absY == 2222) == false && (absX == 3333 && absX == 4444, absY == 3333 && absY == 4444) == true)
	{
		teleportToX = 2222;
		teleportToY = 2222;
	}
			}

Would that work? That is more what I want to do, but I don’t know how to code it.

-Alexia | If you have MSN, add me: ally@runescapesentinel.com // I can tell you what I am trying to do this for, there.

Read full topic

item.title: Using items
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

You big time own me for this 1 lolz

//crystal key if(useItemID == 989 && (atObjectID == 172)) { crystalkey(); }

public void crystalkey() { if (absX == 2222, absY == 2222) == true) { sendMessage("You just got teled!"); deleteItem(989,1); teleportToX = 1111; teleportToY = 1111; } else if (absX == 2222, absY == 2222) == false) { sendMessage("You cannot be teled in this area!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Using items
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Okay… do you have the code for it, or could you make one for me please?

I suck at coding still.

-Alexia

Read full topic

item.title: Using items
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Okay… got another question…

Is there a way to make it that if I use and item with an object, and I am standing on one of 5 certain points on the map, it will teleport me somewhere. But then, if I am standing on one of 5 different spots on the map, it will teleport me somewhere else?

-Alexia

Read full topic

item.title: Using items
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Oh… I see. LMAO… I can’t believe I didn’t notice that before. I always wondered what the 0 was for.

-Alexia | Thanks a ton, tharok ++

Read full topic

item.title: Using items
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Java you are sooooo anoying!!!

Alexia go into autospawn.cfg and the “0” after the X and Y cords on 1 of the npcs is the height level.

Read full topic

item.title: Using items
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

  1. else if(useItemID == 4151 && useWith 4151)) { abyssalwhip(); }

  2. //crystal key else if(useItemID == 989 && (atObjectID == 172))//crystal chest { crystalkey(); }

Enjoy!

~Mod Taharok
